titleStmt.title: The project of peace, or, Unity of faith and government, the only expedient to procure peace, both foreign and domestique and to preserve these nations from the danger of popery and arbitrary tyranny by the author of the countermine.
titleStmt.author: Nalson, John, 1638?-1686.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary, New York.
Attributed to John Nalson. cf. BM.
